result.arabic_text: جَنَّٰتُ عَدۡنٖ يَدۡخُلُونَهَا يُحَلَّوۡنَ فِيهَا مِنۡ أَسَاوِرَ مِن ذَهَبٖ وَلُؤۡلُؤٗاۖ وَلِبَاسُهُمۡ فِيهَا حَرِيرٞ
result.translation: Imirima itotahaye yo mu Bwami bw’ijuru rya “Adeni”, yagenewe kwinjirwamwo abahawe ico Gitabu. Muri Bwo, bazoberwa n’ukwambikwa imiringa y’inzahabu n’ilulu[2], bazoba bambaye n’impuzu za misi yose zishonywe mw’iharire, abagabo ku bagore.
result.footnotes: [2] Lulu, ni ubwoko bw’ubutare bwiburungushuye, bucukurwa mw’ibahari, bukaba buboneka mu binyabuzima biba musi yaryo, bukagira amabara atandukanye; nk’ibara ryera, iryirabura, n’ayandi. Ni ubutare buzimvye cane.
